entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
